description:
Thanks again to AMD for continuing to be a great partner and keeping this series going strong!

Enter the giveaway for the AMD Ultimate Upgrade Gaming Bundle: ROG Ally X + 9700X + ASUS ROG STRIX Motherboard + 32GB DDR5 RAM at https://bit.ly/3XW2oLg

A sensible person chooses a sensible upgrade, RIGHT? Well, maybe not. In this $5000 budget upgrade courtesy of AMD it’s time to see what matters to Creator Warehouse Product Designer Sebastien. 3D Printer? Check. Gaming PC Upgrade. Semi-Check. Modular Laptop. Double Check.
